__e: How can such a small campsite offer so much?
"Who could it be at this time of night?" mother asked me.
Who could it be at this time of night?
Can they be used on snow?
On which parts of the body can it be used?
Can it be used at school?
My family never had any money, how can this be true?
How could he be positive about anything?
If a man is not safe in his own bed, where can he be?
Darling, how could he be in all those places at the same time?
What could happen in three and a half hours?
So how could a man shoot himself, having a gun dangling from his fingers, and it not drop until sometime later?
What right has he to say "must" to me?
-RIGHT NOW, OUR BIG PROBLEM IS WITH PETER.
Maybe one of your men could tell me what I'm here for.
-RIGHT NOW, OUR BIG PROBLEM IS WITH PETER.
How could he leave me alone... when there's so much to be taken care of?
Maybe one of your men could tell me what I'm here for.
So what does it matter how we die?
You're married to me, what can he do about it?
I can't believe a father could do that to his own daughter.
Who could it have been? Who?
Where could Joe be? - Here he is!
Where can he be right now?
Where can he be right now?
What's likely to happen if you don't have the money tomorrow?
Between you and me, what the hell is this guy doing?
Why can't he go where he likes?
Why can't he keep it at home? Where's he been keeping it?
Beating? Tempted to believe not a child, he was a bad person?
